solution_line_template: Todd has ${money_after_ingredients} left after buying ingredients because {borrowed_amount} - {ingredient_cost} = <<{borrowed_amount}-{ingredient_cost}={money_after_ingredients}>>{money_after_ingredients}
Todd made ${money_from_sales} selling snow-cones because {num_snow_cones_sold} x {price_per_snow_cone} = <<{num_snow_cones_sold}*{price_per_snow_cone}={money_from_sales}>>{money_from_sales}

Todd has ${total_money_before_repayment} before he pays his brother back because {money_after_ingredients} + {money_from_sales} = <<{money_after_ingredients}+{money_from_sales}={total_money_before_repayment}>>{total_money_before_repayment}
After Todd pays his brother back he has ${final_money} because {total_money_before_repayment} - {repayment_amount} = <<{total_money_before_repayment}-{repayment_amount}={final_money}>>{final_money}
